attributes.action: tar ALL pornography, with the same brush.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Too many genre's of pornography, have been rounded up into one "sick" area and are now in danger of making criminals, of law abiding, fun and consenting adults. Lets not connect Beastiality with Necrophilia with kinky spanking games. 99.999999% of people know what's right and wrong. Jane Longhursts' death was a result of a man who was hell bent on hurting someone, not because of what he saw.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
